name: Lisa Chen
interest: Senior PM at enterprise SaaS company focused on writing comprehensive technical requirements

education.description: Focus on human-computer interaction and software engineering

jobs.description: Leading B2B infrastructure platform serving 800+ enterprise customers with $50M ARR

projects.title: Multi-Tenant Security Framework
projects.description: Technical requirements: System must support role-based access control (RBAC) with tenant isolation, SOC 2 compliance, and audit logging for all administrative actions

insights.description: Comprehensive requirements reduced development rework by 60%
Launched 4 major features generating $5M+ in new revenue
Reduced customer churn by 25% through data-driven product improvements

jobs.description: Managed analytics dashboard product for mid-market clients

insights.description: Grew product from 0 to 200 enterprise customers in 3 years
Non-functional requirement: API must handle 5000 requests/second with p95 latency < 150ms and 99.9% uptime SLA

User story format: As an enterprise admin, I want SSO integration with Okta/Azure AD so that my team can login using corporate credentials. Acceptance: Users authenticate via SAML 2.0 without creating separate passwords
